Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.interfaces

Interface ReflectionCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentInterface, IntercessionCI, IntrospectionCI, OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReflectionConnector, ReflectionInboundPort, ReflectionOutboundPort
    public interface ReflectionCI
extends IntrospectionCI, IntercessionCI
    The interface ReflectionCI introduces the reflection services offered by the Basic Component Model.

    Description

    The Basic Component Model reflection facility is still under construction. The core idea is to expose through the interface IntrospectionCI methods allowing to introspect components while the interface IntercessionCI exposes the ones that allows to perform intercession with components' own structure and behaviour. In a sense, these interfaces mirror to a large extent the interface ComponentI implemented by the abstract class AbstractComponent and expose it as a component interface.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2018-02-16

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
